description: Semantic search index for the Energy-Flow Cosmology repository. Designed for LLMs, RAG systems and meta-process aware agents.

nodes.summary: One-page description of the full system: meta-architecture, theory, methodology, and human–AI co-processing.
Global manifest describing all major components as a unified semantic graph.
Master architecture diagrams for the entire meta-system and its relation to theory and methodology.
Energy-Flow Cosmology Master Specification: core structure of EFC, including S, Ef and layered submodels.
Formal mathematical specification of Energy-Flow Cosmology, including notation and field equations.
Halo / H-model: structural description of entropy-based halo formation and EFC-S structural layer.
Notation and parameter definitions used across all EFC theory documents.
Root of all schema and JSON-LD definitions for concepts, meta-nodes and APIs.
Concept-level JSON-LD definitions for Energy-Flow Cosmology and related structures.
Top-level directory for the meta-process architecture that models high-order insight formation.
Pattern layer: primitive structural units used by the meta-process to form higher-order insight.
Topology layer: organisation of patterns into shapes and stable structural configurations.
Co-field layer: interaction fields between structures, resolving tensions and amplifying stable configurations.
Integration layer: selection and stabilisation of mature structures before they impact global dynamics.
Global Dynamics: describes system-wide states, transitions and high-level behaviour of the meta-process.
Definition of operational structural tasks executed by the meta-process (coherence, transitions, load, boundaries).
Standardised sequences of tasks (workflows) that run meta-process procedures such as stabilisation and transitions.
Self-evaluation layer: metrics, diagnostics and structural performance evaluation of the meta-architecture.
Validation plan: structural criteria, test phases and methods to validate that the meta-architecture behaves as intended.
Process-of-Process: mechanisms for modifying, simplifying and evolving the meta-architecture itself.
Roadmap: forward-looking plan for future developments and structural changes in the meta-architecture.
Milestones: documented past structural events and key changes in the evolution of the meta-architecture.
Meta-Reflective Protocol: formal rules for how reflection is performed in a bounded, non-psychological way.
Reflection Index: registry of reflection domains, surfaces, types and levels within the architecture.
Metascope: defines the structural viewpoint used to observe the full architecture as a single system.
Root of methodology documents: open method, symbiosis, reproducibility and epistemology.
Open Method: definition of the research workflow, including AI assistance, versioning and transparency.
Symbiosis Interface: description of the human–AI co-processing model and its structural constraints.
Reproducibility Guide: instructions and structure for reproducing analyses, models and meta-process behaviour.
